name: Erotic World Book Day
tagline: Celebrating great erotic books and writers on World Book Day, while fundraising for sexual wellbeing charity Brook
body: Did you know there’s a special day to celebrate the magic of literature? [World Book Day](http://worldbookday.com/) is March 5th ([in the UK](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Book_Day)). What’s your relationship with books? Have you always loved them since you were a child, or did you only discover their delights as an adult?
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
